p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Letterhead of M’s proposed baronial coat of arms: 71-10-08a_image01.jpg See also Home (2017). Melbourne bot. Garden

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Dr Wagner of Gotha bids me to convey to the Government of N. S Wales his best thanks for the supply of valuable statistic documents,
Letter not found.
which have been utilized for the Diplomatic Almanac
Gothaischer Hofkalender ( Almanach de Gotha ).
of 1872. He further solicits, that annually any new statistic records may be furnished to him, in order that always the most recent account may be given of your colony. As this will be for the benefit of N. S. Wales itself, I felt no scruples to bring the Editors wish under your favorable notice The Almanac has appeared now uninterruptedly for 109 years and is used at every court & ambassady.
embassy?

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
